task.title: Reset Syllabification
task.shortdesc: In the event of display issues in Target Syllables or Actual Syllables in the Syllabification & Alignment view, it may be necessary to reset the syllabification of IPA Target and IPA Actual transcriptions.

step.cmd: Select the Project Check Transcriptions... menu item.
step.stepresult: This will open the Check Transcriptions window.

step.cmd: Select the Reset syllabification option. To reset phone alignment as well, select the also reset phone alignment check box.
Choose an appropriate syllabifier by selecting it from the drop-down menu.
Select the project, or the corpora or sessions whose syllabification you wish to reset, and click Next.
step.stepresult: Phon will re-perform the syllabification for each selected session using the Syllabifier Language chosen in the Preferences dialog. After resetting syllabification or alignment, it will be necessary to visually verify these tiers.
